intent_atoms.description: Build SwiftUI app shell with document browser and recents list using CoreData-backed session persistence
Use CoreData for session persistence in the SwiftUI app shell
Configure performance benchmarks for large MP4 files by standing up benchmarking harnesses using streaming fixtures to measure CLI and app throughput
Benchmarking harnesses must measure both CLI and app throughput for large MP4 payloads
Expose global logging and telemetry toggles once streaming metrics are exposed to the CLI
Execute streaming inspection by consuming ParsePipeline events when Task D2 builds the streaming command
Streaming inspection must consume ParsePipeline events during Task D2's streaming command build
Produce validation reports with the streaming pipeline once Task D3 (? ??) — "… .. "

functional_units.name: SwiftUI App Shell
functional_units.description: Provides a SwiftUI application shell featuring a document browser and recents list backed by CoreData for session persistence.

functional_units.name: Performance Benchmarking Harnesses
functional_units.description: Offers benchmarking tools to measure CLI and app throughput for large MP4 files using streaming fixtures.

functional_units.name: Global Logging & Telemetry Toggles
functional_units.description: Enables toggling of surface-level global logging and telemetry within the system when streaming metrics are available.

functional_units.name: Streaming Inspection Consumer
functional_units.description: Consumes ParsePipeline events during Task D2 to inspect streaming data.

functional_units.name: Validation Report Generator
functional_units.description: Produces validation reports from the streaming pipeline once the CLI output contract is defined.

functional_units.name: Export Operation Routing
functional_units.description: Routes export operations to streaming capture utilities as they transition from ISOInspectorCLIRunner.
